description: Environment and Climate Change Canada requires the services of a Privacy Impact Specialist, as and when requested, to assess and provide recommendations to improve Enforcement Branch policies, procedures, and directives concerning information management and compliance with the Privacy Act.
duration_in_months: There is no clear indication of the occurrence of the duration
full_summary:
================

**Notice No.** | 5000066508-A
****             ispiel       _no__1


**Title**                                  | Privacy Impact Specialist Level 2-Intermediate for Category C.16
**Titre**                                  | Spécialiste des évaluations des facteurs relatifs à la vie privée C.16 de niveau 2-Intermédiaire


**Contracting Entity**                      | Environment and Climate Change Canada
**Entité contractante**                     | Environnement et changement climatique Canada


**Reference**                              | CB-5063-93702827
**Référence**                              | CB-5063-93702827


**Publication Date**                       | April 27, 2023
**Date de publication**                     | 27 avril 2023


**Tender Closing Date**                    | June 6, 2023 at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
**Appel d'offres date de clôture**          | 6 juin 2023 à 14h00 heure de l'Est


**Type of Procurement**                    | Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Nature de l'appel d'offres**              | Demande de proposition

**Description**                            | Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking the services of a Privacy Impact Specialist Level 2-Intermediate. The successful vendor will provide assessment and recommendations to improve Enforcement Branch policies, procedures, and directives concerning information management and compliance with the Privacy Act.


**Duration**                               | Six months
**Durée**                                  | Six mois


**Selection Criteria**                    | The successful vendor will be selected based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.


**Trade Agreements**                       | This procurement is subject to the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), amongst others.


**Attachments**                            | The tender notice and supporting documents can be found at the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5063/5000066508-a---npp_en.pdf


**Contact**                               | For more information, please contact Tim Pelletier at timothy.pelletier@ec.gc.ca or 902 920
